labels.value: src.test.resources.features.shoppingCart_feature.As a user, I want to check cart details

name: verify product added to cart

steps.name: Given  user open home page
Application [https://www.amazon.in/] opened successfully
When  user login to application
Element [ xpath: //a[@id='nav-link-accountList'] found successfully
Clicked on element [Proxy element for: DefaultElementLocator 'By.xpath: //a[@id='nav-link-accountList']'] successfully
Element [ id: ap_email] found successfully
Text [9923374848] entered into text box [ id: ap_email] successfully
Element [ id: continue] found successfully
Clicked on element [[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (dd0cea7221743eabfb91437adaa8afce)] -> id: continue]] successfully
Element [ id: ap_password] found successfully
Text [ghatrai12!@] entered into text box [ id: ap_password] successfully
Element [ id: signInSubmit] found successfully
Clicked on element [[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (dd0cea7221743eabfb91437adaa8afce)] -> id: signInSubmit]] successfully
When  user search product by name "4K TV"
Element [ id: twotabsearchtextbox] found successfully
Text [4K TV] entered into text box [ id: twotabsearchtextbox] successfully
Element [ id: nav-search-submit-button] found successfully
Clicked on element [[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (dd0cea7221743eabfb91437adaa8afce)] -> id: nav-search-submit-button]] successfully
Then  I found search results
Element [ xpath: //a[@class='a-link-normal s-no-outline'] found successfully
And  user click on product
Element [ xpath: //div[@class='a-section a-spacing-none puis-padding-right-small s-title-instructions-style'//h2/a] found successfully

Clicked on element [[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (dd0cea7221743eabfb91437adaa8afce)] -> xpath: //div[@class='a-section a-spacing-none puis-padding-right-small s-title-instructions-style']//h2/a]] successfully
And  user click on add to cart
Element [ id: add-to-cart-button] found successfully
Clicked on element [[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (dd0cea7221743eabfb91437adaa8afce)] -> id: add-to-cart-button]] successfully
Then  user verify product added message
Element [ xpath: //span[@class='a-size-medium-plus a-color-base sw-atc-text a-text-bold'] found successfully
Actual text [Added to Cart] and Expected text [Added to Cart] are matched
And  user click on cart button
Element [ id: attach-sidesheet-view-cart-button] found successfully
Clicked on element [Proxy element for: DefaultElementLocator 'By.id: attach-sidesheet-view-cart-button'] successfully
Then  user verify product added to cart
Element [ xpath: //div[@data-name='Active Items'//div[@class='sc-item-content-group'//a[@class='a-link-normal sc-product-link'] found successfully
